content.rendered:
Directed by Anees Bazmee.

Written by Rupinder Chahal. Rajesh Chawla. Balwinder Singh Janjua. Balwinder Singh Janjua. Sameer Rajda.

Cast Anil Kapoor(Kartar Singh). Arjun Kapoor(Charanveer Singh / Karanveer Singh). Ileana D’Cruz(Sweety). Athiya Shetty(Binkle). Neha Sharma(Nafisa Qureshi).Vineet Kumar Singh. Pawan Malhotra(Baljeet). Ratna Pathak Shah(Jeeto (as Ratna Pathak)). Karan Kundrra(Munpreet Singh (as Karan Kundra)). Anil Charanjeett((as Anil Mange)). Rahul Dev(Sandhu (Binkle’s Father)). Monisha Hassen(Mrs. Sandhu (Binkle’s Mum)). Gurpal Singh(Gill (Sweety’s Father)). Mohit Chhabra(Billa).Nikkita Chadha. Sasha Dolbenko(Jolly). James Abery(Druggy). Ayesha Ali(Engagement Party & Wedding Guest). Manoj Anand(Charanveer’s Relative). Sarah Andrews(International Passenger (as Sara Alves)). Arjun Arje(Waiter). Deepshikha Arora(Wedding and Reception Relative). Hitanshu Arora(Wedding and Reception relative). Ro Ashika(Gurdwara & Wedding Guest). Raj Awasti(Engagement Party & Wedding Guest). Rosie Baglee(Dancer). Toni Beard(Engagement Party Guest). Kishore Bhatt(Engagement Party & Wedding Guest).Kara Buckley. Tatiana Natalia Carpenter(Airport Traveller (as Tatiana Zarubova)). Rajiv Chabria(Family member in wedding scene). Tina Chandorkar(Gurdwara & Engagement Party Guest). Usman Chauhan(Gurudwara and Engagement Party Guest). Sajia Chowdhury(Engagement Party & Wedding Guest). David Clement-Horton(Airport Maintenance). Sarinka Dabydeen(Gurdwara Wedding Guest). Zar Damani(Waiter).

Language Hindi.

Producers Ollwyn Dsouza. Jim Edgar. Jatin Pawan Girotra. Balwinder Singh Janjua. Himanshu Joshi. Firuzi Khan. Pranjal Khandhdiya. Murad Khetani. Niraj Kothari. Kapil Madnani. Vibhu Maurya. Cyrus Patel. Yogiraj Shetty. Navmeet Singh. Ashwin Varde.

Production Cine1 Studios. Mark Production. Prime Focus.
